mapper.select: select sub_name, co_name, co_startTime,co_startDate, cli_name, cli_phone, emp_name, co_condition from assign a join client c2 left outer join subject s on s.sub_no = a.sub_no left outer join course c on c.co_no = a.co_no left outer join student s2 on s2.cli_no = c2.cli_no left outer join employee e on e.emp_no =s2.emp_no;
